name: Canon Live
description:
Left Click: Near Focus Step
Right Click: Far Focus Step
Middle Click: Auto Focus
Keep-Alive Feature

For non-continuous auto focus lenses tested with Canon Kiss X4
If you have continuous auto focus camera and lens you can use
Canon EOS Webcam Utility
https://www.usa.canon.com/internet/portal/us/home/support/self-help-center/eos-w...
